snippet: Among the changes are a system for direct bond issuance by local governments and streamlining the approval process for initial public offerings.
abstract: China pledges to push ahead with broad range of overhauls to its financial markets as it seeks to encourage more efficient capital allocation, increase foreign investment and improve transparency of its markets.
lead_paragraph: Among the changes are a system for direct bond issuance by local governments and streamlining the approval process for initial public offerings.

headline.main: China Recommits to a Sweeping Overhaul of Market Policies
headline.print_headline: China Vows to Push Ahead With Financial Reforms
